scripts.git: echo 'Enter commit message and press [ENTER]: ' && read ID && git add . && git commit -m '$ID' && git push origin master
scripts.git-stage: npm run git && git push heroku master
scripts.setup-dev: npm run dev-app && npm run dev-env && npm run dev-auth
scripts.setup-staging: npm run staging-app && npm run staging-env && npm run staging-auth
scripts.dev-env: npm run CLIENT_ID && npm run CLIENT_SECRET && npm run PORT && npm run MONGO && npm install
scripts.staging-app: echo http://$USER-${PWD##*/}-staging.herokuapp.com/oauth | pbcopy && heroku create $USER-${PWD##*/}-staging && open https://api.slack.com/apps/new
scripts.staging-env: npm run MONGO-staging && npm run CLIENT_ID-staging && npm run CLIENT_SECRET-staging
scripts.CLIENT_ID: echo 'Enter the apps CLIENT_ID and press [ENTER]: ' && read ID && echo 'CLIENT_ID='$ID > .env
scripts.CLIENT_SECRET: echo 'Enter the apps CLIENT_SECRET and press [ENTER]: ' && read ID && echo 'CLIENT_SECRET='$ID >> .env
scripts.CLIENT_ID-staging: echo 'Enter the staging apps CLIENT_ID and press [ENTER]: ' && read ID && heroku config:set CLIENT_ID=$ID
scripts.CLIENT_SECRET-staging: echo 'Enter the staging apps CLIENT_SECRET and press [ENTER]: ' && read ID && heroku config:set CLIENT_SECRET=$ID
